member.summary: A service that is used to verify a request of acknowledgement by the sender of a webhook, before the webhook is sent.

remarks.para: In several case scenarios, providers of webhooks require a verification of the party to ensure they are the ones who should be receiving the webhooks, and not a malicious party.
